articles.title: Lady Gaga's Chromatica is the fastest-selling album of 2020 - BBC News
articles.description: The star's sixth album, Chromatica, outsold the rest of the Top 10 combined to debut at number one.
articles.content:

 The star's sixth album was originally due out in April, but was delayed due to the Covid-19 pandemic
